main event: Several witnesses reported seeing unusual flying objects in the sky over Spokane, with descriptions of brilliant white lights and a disc-shaped object.
interesting points: Major witness reported seeing 10-12 brilliant white lights in a V formation,The objects were traveling rapidly with no sound or trail,Another witness from a drive-in theater reported seeing two luminous white discs later in the evening,The objects displayed unusual maneuvers including a 360-degree turn,The size of one disc was compared to one-sixth the size of a full moon.
sighted object: Brilliant white lights and luminous white discs
witness description: Civilian observers including two women and a military officer
